reviewText: I liked this movie " Guns of The Civil War " because it furnished me with some facts about armament Of the armies that I seemed to have overlooked or forgotten about. I also liked it because of the photography showing the details of the weaponry involved. My favorites were the Henry and Spencer Rifles. These two weapons I feel, helped usher in the era of modern war fare along with the Gatling gun.
Too long and very dull.  Could have been more exciting for sure.  I don't know if I would recommend this.
